text: 不论是否有HPV感染、细胞学是否异常的适龄女性均可接种HPV疫苗。近期有妊娠计划和妊娠期、哺乳期女性不宜接种HPV疫苗。接种HPV疫苗后仍应进行子宫颈癌筛查。【关键词】 人乳头瘤病毒；疫苗；临床应用；高危；特殊人群 # Chinese expert consensus on clinical application of human papilloma virus vaccine Gynecological Oncology Society of Chinese Medical Association, Chinese Society for Colposcopy and Cervical Pathology Corresponding author: Ma Ding, E-mail: ma@tjh.
